item.title: Extensive shop front spray tagging of Premises seemingly under renovation at 5, 7 or 9 High St Penge (could not see the number)., 27th June
item.description:
Extensive shop front spray tagging of Premises seemingly under renovation at 5, 7 or 9 High St Penge (could not see the number). This may be the same as reported about 4 months ago to which the answer was the owners consent could not be obtained. My apologies for raising this, if so, but maybe there is a new owner now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Bridge to Windmill Bridge Junction, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass area on micawber house dickens estate se16, 27th June
item.description:

item.title: Van in same place for 4 months plus, 27th June
item.description:
The van has not moved from a parking bay and is in a controlled parking zone. Because the lamppost has been replaced there are no parking signs so the van has been there 24/7 for months on end.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sutherland Avenue, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
